# wellspell.addin

![](https://github.com/nevrome/wellspell.addin/raw/master/inst/gif/mastake.gif)

```{r, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
zz <- textConnection("rd", "w")
tools::Rd2txt("man/wellspell.Rd", zz)
close(zz)

rd <- gsub("\\*", "**", rd)
rd <- gsub("\\'", "`", rd)
rd <- gsub("\\'", "`", rd)
rd <- gsub("            â€¢", "  -", rd)
rd <- gsub("    ", "", rd)

purrr::walk(
  rd[4:(grep("_\bU_\bs_\ba_\bg_\be:", rd) - 1)],
  function(x) {
    cat(x)
    cat("  \n")
  }
)
```
